name: Mad Dojo
description: Are you mad enough to prove your ninja skills in Mad Dojo? You’ll get a lot of headache and break a gamepad until you master insanely difficult obstacles, impress Sensei and earn his daughter’s sympathies! But we warn you - we don’t take wimpy players! Just do it!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel i3 / AMD FX Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: VGA GPU Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 Processor: Intel i5 / AMD FX Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: VGA GPU Storage: 500 MB available space
